website_summaries.verdict: For larger holes and recessed lighting, this hole saw solution is a sure way to cut down your labor time. It even includes a full lifetime warranty.
pros: Able to cut through drywall, plywood, plaster, and other common materials, this adjustable cutter could be the last hole saw you ever need to buy
Can replace an entire set from 1 and 3/16 inches to 8 and 5/8 inches, making it ideal for recessed lighting holes, and a much easier solution than a jig saw
cons: Hole cutter is not entirely balanced, can be a bit wobbly on start-up before the bit is fully engaged
The cutting bit can also jam up in softer materials

customer_reviews.title: performance, reliability and cleanliness
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. I bought a tool like this back in 1989. I finally wore it out in 2017 and bought one of these and it has performed excellent. Better than the old one I had. However, I have had to buy a new one because, I lost the other one in the fires that ravaged my town of Paradise CA last month. My customers love it when I break out this tool. No fuss, no muss. I cuts a perfect hole with little to no dust to get all over the customers house....
customer_reviews.author: T keith

customer_reviews.title: EZ Hole Cutter
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product. I bought it initially for the purpose of cutting 7&1/2" holes through 1x10" pressure treated planks. I was able to cut 5 perfect holes in quick succession through typically dense PT lumber. Way better than using a jig saw. You do have to take care when using it and hold the drill as steady as possible while letting the blade cut its way through the lumber. Don't try to force it. Well made and nicely packaged. Glad to have it in the tool collection.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Slow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combination of speed and accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: This hole saw set is not only an awesome time saver, it also helps ensure an OCD standard of perfection in the quality of your work. I just did redid the lighting in a kitchen for a remodel, and I used a couple of Bosch lasers to line out precisely where each light needs to go. The use of a hole saw let me cut out perfect holes exactly on the laser mark without leaving behind a mess of drywall dust at all. Plus, it’s much easier to carry this one adjustable tool around than a series of hole saws in all different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Catullus

customer_reviews.title: works great. It's great to have one tool to cut ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality tool, works great. It's great to have one tool to cut many size holes. I had a 6" hole saw that would cut out Halo cans but wouldn't fit the Juno cans, now I don't have to worry about it. The dust catcher works great as well. Cut the hole and hold it against the ceiling for a few seconds to let the dust settle and practically none goes into the room. Arrived on time and it perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and super well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well built unit. I use it mostly for cutting holes in wood and plastic using a hand drill or a drill press. It's really nice to be able to put big holes in stuff w/o needing to get it up onto my drill press or make a router template. It's infinitely adjustable up to 81⁄2", which is awesome for what I use it for. Has completely replaced my many hole saws for anything clean... for nasty stuff (remo, subfloor etc) I still use hole saws. Will mosdef be using it when I next install some cans. Overall a great purchase. That said, I REALLY wish they would make the replacement blades Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: advena

customer_reviews.title: works pretty good, a little lack of instructions when it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tool to cut large holes on fiberglass, works pretty good, a little lack of instructions when it was shipped on how to properly use the tool. Customer service is one of the best I've delt with in Amazon. And I would highly recomend this product and the dealings with this seller
customer_reviews.author: Oz.M

customer_reviews.title: YOU CANT GO WRONG!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If only i knew about this hole saw sooner!!!! IT'S AMAZING no mess so much time saved, happy customers. I have installed far too many can lights and wish i had this hole saw years ago!! it cuts the cleanest hole i have ever seen in drywall, cuts well on chip board, i haven't tried on metal yet but I'm sure its amazing at that. This thing is built to last, SOLID!!! STOP LOOKING AT IT AND BUY IT!!!!! If you are a contractor or anyone who installs can lights or plans on it this thing is worth the price, heck it's the cost of 1 hour from an electrical contractor!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Tohlen

customer_reviews.title: it works great and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Well....it works great and as advertised! I have used it to cut about 10 4" recessed lighting fixtures and plan to do an additional 4 on exterior wood soffiting. The adjustment works great and makes cleanup non-existant! If you are using this to cut a round hole using an existing 4" square ceiling box cutout just install a small 1x2 or 1x3 wood brad behind the existing hole and use that for your pilot hole.
customer_reviews.author: Rex W. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with my purchase. I bought it because I had 6" remodel cans to install into painted knotty pine T&G ceiling. Didn't want any paint touch ups and the saw couldn't have done a cleaner job! Also, I had emailed the manufacture about the application of the additional cutter included in the box and he replied the same day! BTW that extra blade is for cutting thin materials such as sheet metal, acrylic, laminate, etc. up to about 1/8".
customer_reviews.author: Michael Palyszeski

customer_reviews.title: Looks Ok !
customer_reviews.text: Had job completed before tool arrived , seems to be quality product and will do larger holes. I mistakenly ordered wrong kit had to return and get correct kit . will use in the future .
customer_reviews.author: Delbert E. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tool. I wish I have this when I was installed recessed lights for customers remodels. Bought it for my own use and am happy with the performance of the cut and how it catches most of the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: We have tried several other products that made me leery of anything like this, but this product is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The Discovery of this product has changed my life and the life of my employees who use this product. I run a Electrical Contracting business and we specialize in remodels. We are cutting in an average of 75 can lights a month. We have tried several other products that made me leery of anything like this, but this product is amazing! I now own 5 of them!
customer_reviews.author: MichaelJ

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't sure about buying this tool. It is pretty expensive but I had several lights to put in and the reviews were good. I must say that I am impressed by the quality of this tool. I have been a machinist for 35 years and I can honestly say that this tool is very well engineered and built. It works very well and I have no regrets about buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy Blue

customer_reviews.title: A great tool at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built unit that did a wonderful job cutting over a dozen holes in my lath and plaster ceiling for 6" recessed lights. The plastic "reservoir" does a great job keeping debris from raining down on you while cutting. The bits are very sharp so be careful. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Stone

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling tile or sheetrock no problem.
customer_reviews.text: OKAY for cutting sheetrock of ceiling tile. I bought it to cut a hole in a fiberglass sump pump basin, and after examining it decided it was unlikely it would do the job. Returned it for prompt refund.
customer_reviews.author: PlaneOldStuff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durable hole cutter
customer_reviews.text: As an experienced electrician specializing in recessed lights, this is one of the best hole cutters I've used. Large dust collector and cutter adjustment make this tool easy to use - cuts smooth holes through drywall.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with the tool
customer_reviews.text: My EZ Professional Hole Saw Kit arrived on time as promised. I used it the next day. I sawed 6 holes in 45 year old plaster, slick as a ribbon. Extremely satisfied with the tool. I like the fact that it will drill multiple size holes as well as many different types of materials. I also love that this tool eliminated 99% of the dust and mess. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Terry / NC Elect Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool. I will never to looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to make a 6 1/2 " hole in the deck of my boat for an access plate. The area was limited. Looked for a standard hole saw but could not find one larger than 6" Came across this and decided to give it a try. It arrived quickly and was packaged in a durable case. Read over the instructions and fired it up. Had the hole done in just a few minutes. Wonderful tool. I will never to looking for a hold saw again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Biggerstaff

customer_reviews.title: Super customer service and product!
customer_reviews.text: This hole saw is amazing! The quality construction and performance is exceptional. I used it to cut 4 recessed lighting holes in a newly painted gyp board popcorn ceiling and ease and precision was the rule of the day! I lost the email from the owner with additional use instructions and sent a request through the web site and with in a few hours had the additional instructions again. Great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked good on flat metal
customer_reviews.text: Don't use on metal with even a small ridge or anything not flat! Worked good on flat metal. Never used on drywall. Pretty expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper 808

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. fast shipping. also received quick start guide via email. A+
customer_reviews.author: watertherapy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Hole saw arrived on time. Looks and feels like of a quality tool. I haven't put it to the test yet but will leave a follow up when that happens. Thanks !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Castillo

customer_reviews.title: It can get pretty heavy when puting a hole in the ceiling in ...
customer_reviews.text: After learning how to use it this worked very well. You have to ease it in and let it work, not too much speed in either direction (rotational or in penetration). It can get pretty heavy when puting a hole in the ceiling in the ceiling, but there is no problem about putting it down and resting for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Hand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have been woodworking for the better part of 30 years, I have always cut circles with a compass and a jigg or band saw...i am kicking myself for never buying one of these before. Set up and measurement adjustments are fast, simple, and acurate. Circles are precisely as measured. I made 6 different size cuts on a sheet of 3/4inch oak ply board and it ripped through with little effort. I made all 6 cuts in the time it would normally take me to make one cut. My only complaint is the plastic shield does not have a vacuum port, nothing a Dremel, plastic welder, and some scrap plastic pipe can't cure.
customer_reviews.author: Marine01

customer_reviews.title: a must have tool for every electrician.
customer_reviews.text: it is a great tool for every electrician. if you ever use it only for one can you will never want to cut the hole with a handsaw again. saves you a lot of time and theres no mess to worry about.i just love it.and my costumers love it too-no mess no stress.
customer_reviews.author: Ilona Matyka

customer_reviews.title: Love it Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love specialty tools that have a nice case and this one tool keeps me from having a box full of hole saws with missing diameters. With this one tool I can set the diameter to whatever I need. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: This product is one of the best tools for cutting holes for recessed lights I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best tools for cutting holes for recessed lights I have ever seen. We just remodeled a 3500 sf home and have installed over 30 recessed can lights. This tool keeps the dust from getting in your eyes and going all over everything when cutting the hole. I would recommend this tool to anyone that needs to cut holes.

I would recommend EZ HOLE for any union and non union electrician out there. I thank you so much to the person in charge for following up about the product.

product_meta.title: EZ HOLE Professional Hole Saw Cutter with Full
product_meta.description:
This Hole Saw Kit Makes it Easy 
Just set the cutter to the correct size and attach it to a drill. It will cut a clean hole while trapping all of the dust and debris inside its plastic shield.

A Complete Kit 
Each kit includes an all steel hole cutter, specially designed dust shield with full ball bearings, extra blade for various surfaces, adjustment wrenches, and a durable storage case. The saw is fully adjustable from 1-3/16" to 8-5/8" and cuts up to 7/8" deep on one side or 1-3/4" deep from both sides. 

Eliminate the Dust and Mess 
Drywall and plaster dust can be a nightmare to control, especially when working inside a furnished home. Dust and debris is captured inside the hole cutter's transparent cowl rather than going airborne and making mess. 

Replaceable Blade 
Inexpensive replacement blades are readily available and can be changed in seconds. 

Full Lifetime Warranty 
Only the cutter blade and pilot bit are not included in lifetime warranty but are fully replaceable after normal wear.

*Not for use on uneven surfaces such as plank siding
feature_bullets: FULL LIFETIME WARRANTY - The last hole cutter you'll ever need to buy.
CUTS HOLES WITH EASE - Ideal for plywood, drywall, plaster, etc. *Not for wood siding or uneven surfaces.
HEAVY DUTY - Carbide cutting blade, all metal jig, sealed ball bearings, and an ABS dust shield
COSTS LESS - This kit can replace an entire hole saw set from 1-3/16" to 8-5/8" for much less
REPLACEABLE BLADE & BIT - Inexpensive tungsten carbide replacement blades and pilot bits readily available

specifications.Warranty Description: Full Lifetime Warranty. Simply contact us to receive a return number, then send the product to us and we will repair or replace it and return it to you free of charge. This warranty is valid for any of the 50 United States. Cutter blade and pilot bit is not included in lifetime warranty but are fully replaceable after normal wear.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
